thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Invited A Bunch Of Random Fans From A Hollywood Tour Bus Into The Oscars
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Invited A Bunch Of Random Fans From A Hollywood Tour Bus Into The Oscars

author: Lindsay Farber
title: Jimmy Kimmel Invited A Bunch Of Random Fans From A Hollywood Tour Bus Into The Oscars
text:
View this image ›
MARK RALSTON / Getty ID: 10601921 2. Like, CAN YOU EVEN IMAGINE?!?!?!?! ID: 10601926 3. Jimmy prepped the A-list audience before the prank went down: View this image ›
ABC ID: 10601929 View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602144 5. And sure enough, moments later, a number of people exited a giant red double-decker bus and entered the Dolby Theater in Hollywood, thinking they were just going to see an Oscars exhibit. View this image ›
ABC Little did they know, they were literally about to walk into the Academy Awards.
ID: 10601933 6. Naturally, once the doors opened, they were SHOOK. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10601951 7. S-H-O-O-K. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10601952 8. They literally didn’t know what to do. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10601991 9. One man, by the name of Gary, was EXTRA excited. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602010 10. And Gary’s fiancée, Vicky, was there too. She told Jimmy that they were getting married on July 18th, but was left almost speechless the second she saw Denzel Washington. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10601955 11. Denzel ended up giving both Gary and Vicky a hug and also pronounced them husband and wife. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602296 12. The entire ordeal was pretty wild. Mahershala Ali let Gary hold his brand new Oscar… View this image ›
Kevin Winter / Getty Images ID: 10602336 13. Jen Aniston gave Vicky her sunglasses… View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602364 View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602394 15. And to top it all off, Meryl Streep even shook the tourists hands! View this image ›
Mark Ralston / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10602367 16. Nicely played, Jimmy. Nicely played, indeed. ID: 10602397 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
